feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
